title: client fail update
body: when i update my lol. it appear a text said" unspecified error occurred please check the logs for more information" path 7.7. can somebody help me to fix this. thanks guys..

replies.body:
Hey there,

If this is happening at or above 33% then your connection might be failing to reach the patching server.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix it up.  Let me know if you run into any issues.
